results.t: OTC Markets: Official site of OTCQX, OTCQB and Pink Markets
results.p: Get Stock & Bond Quotes, Trade Prices, Charts, Financials and Company News & Information for OTCQX, OTCQB and Pink Securities.
Mar 5, 2024 — The OTC market is where securities trade via a broker-dealer network instead of on a centralized exchange like the New York Stock Exchange.
